import React, { useState, Fragment } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { connect } from 'react-redux' const CreateProfile = (props) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '', }) const { displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs } = useState(flase) const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram, } = formData return (

Create Your Profile

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
Could be your own company or one you work for
Could be your own or a company website
City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs && (
)} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = {} export default CreateProfile
